p: Inflammatory changes in arterial lesions are characterized by the recruitment and activation of monocytes/macrophages, which are regulated by CCL2. This chemoattractant cytokine has been shown to play a vital role in the initiation and progression of arteriosclerotic lesions in experimental animals [ 73]. The effect of the essential oils on CCL2 release by LPS-stimulated THPâ€‘1 cells was also evaluated.
